name: Piczle Puzzle Adventures + Picto Quest Puzzle Bundle
summary:
Solve nonogram logic puzzles and experience the story of two different puzzle adventures!

Piczle Cross Adventure
Follow our heroes Score-chan, Gig and professor Matrix in a daunting open-world adventure. Foil the plans of the evil Dr. Mona Chromatic and under_SCORE. Restore each area by completing nonogram puzzles and rebuild the world. Earn XP, level up and uncover the secrets of Piczleshire!

PictoQuest: The Cursed Grids
Challenge your logic skills by helping our two young heroes on their quest to return the legendary paintings of Pictoria! Defeat enemies on your way (even bosses!) to stop the sneaky wizard Moonface. Help villagers with special missions and buy magical items from the store that can help you on journey.
